## R/Bioconductor packages

I have developed **10** packages on `CRAN` and **9** on `Bioconductor`. For `CRAN` packages, you can use `install.packages()` to install them directly and for `Bioconductor` packages, you need to follow the guide on package homepage by using `biocLite()` to install.


<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bioconductor/BiocStickers/master/ChIPseeker/ChIPseeker.png" height="120"/>
<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bioconductor/BiocStickers/master/clusterProfiler/clusterProfiler.png" height="120"/>
<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bioconductor/BiocStickers/master/ggtree/ggtree.png" height="120"/>
<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bioconductor/BiocStickers/master/treeio/treeio.png" height="120"/>


If you are interesting, please visit package homepage to learn more.

```{r echo=F, message=F}
packageTitle <- ypages:::packageTitle
```

+ CRAN
	- [badger](http://cran.r-project.org/package=badger): `r packageTitle('badger', 'CRAN')`
	- [base2grob](http://cran.r-project.org/package=base2grob): `r packageTitle('base2grob', 'CRAN')`
    - [dlstats](http://cran.r-project.org/package=dlstats): `r packageTitle('dlstats', 'CRAN')`
	- [emojifont](http://cran.r-project.org/package=emojifont): `r packageTitle('emojifont', 'CRAN')`
	- [ggimage](http://cran.r-project.org/package=ggimage): `r packageTitle('ggimage', 'CRAN')`
    - [meme](http://cran.r-project.org/package=meme): `r packageTitle('meme', 'CRAN')`
    - [rvcheck](http://cran.r-project.org/package=rvcheck): `r packageTitle('rvcheck', 'CRAN')`
	- [scatterpie](http://cran.r-project.org/package=scatterpie): `r packageTitle('scatterpie', 'CRAN')`
    - [shadowtext](http://cran.r-project.org/package=shadowtext): `r packageTitle('shadowtext', 'CRAN')`
    - [tidytree](http://cran.r-project.org/package=tidytree): `r packageTitle('tidytree', 'CRAN')`

	- [clusterProfiler](https://guangchuangyu.github.io/software/clusterProfiler): `r packageTitle('clusterProfiler', 'BioC')`
	- [DOSE](https://guangchuangyu.github.io/software/DOSE): `r packageTitle('DOSE', 'BioC')`
	- [enrichplot](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/enrichplot): `r packageTitle('enrichplot', 'BioC')`

	- [GOSemSim](https://guangchuangyu.github.io/software/GOSemSim): `r packageTitle('GOSemSim', 'BioC')`
	- [meshes](https://guangchuangyu.github.io/software/meshes): `r packageTitle('meshes', 'BioC')`
